descript.abstract: Provide compiled GTFS schedule data in geospatial format. Transit routes associates route information to shapes. Transit stops associates aggregated stop times and route information for each stop.
descript.purpose: Provide all transit stops and routes (geospatial) from transit operators serving California. Data reflects operator-provided GTFS feeds and may include areas outside California if the operator provides service in multiple states or countries.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Length of feature in internal units.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Full name of the transit agency

Indicates the type of transportation used on a route. Valid options are 0 - Tram, Streetcar, Light rail. Any light rail or street level system within a metropolitan area. 1 - Subway, Metro. Any underground rail system within a metropolitan area. 2 - Rail. Used for intercity or long-distance travel. 3 - Bus. Used for short- and long-distance bus routes. 4 - Ferry. Used for short- and long-distance boat service. 5 - Cable tram. Used for street-level rail cars where the cable runs beneath the vehicle (e.g., cable car in San Francisco). 6 - Aerial lift, suspended cable car (e.g., gondola lift, aerial tramway). Cable transport where cabins, cars, gondolas or open chairs are suspended by means of one or more cables. 7 - Funicular. Any rail system designed for steep inclines. 11 - Trolleybus. Electric buses that draw power from overhead wires using poles. 12 - Monorail. Railway in which the track consists of a single rail or a beam.
A standardized route_name for the route_id (can be route_short_name, route_long_name, or route_desc)
Daily trips associated with this shape_id and route_id.
The base64 encoded url for the feed associated with the agency
Route number or numbers of California State Highway System routes that this shape_id and route_id travels on.
0 or 1 indicating if this shape_id or route_id overlaps with the California State Highway System
Caltrans District numbers containing each California State Highway System route that this shape_id and route_id travels on.
Percentage of shape_id and route_id distance traveling on any California State Highway System route.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
